name: Bunker Battles
description:
Prototype for a simple Cannonhill-like game.

Please note that the network multiplayer currently only works in the downloadable versions of the game and not in the web demo.

Current Features:
  • Network multiplayer with two levels (2 and 4 players). [Doesn't work in the web demo]
  • Offline multiplayer on the same PC.
  • Single player sandbox level (with exploding barrels!)
  • Probably lots of multiplayer related bugs
Controls Player 1:

Shoot: Hold and release "Space" or "S"
Aim left: "A" or "arrow-left"
Aim right: "D" or "arrow-right"
Menu: "Esc"

Controls Player 2:

Shoot: Hold and release "K"
Aim left: "J"
Aim right: "L"
